subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. handed down a 30-game suspension Wednesday to the Islanders’ Chris Simon for deliberately stamping on the right foot of the Penguins’ Jarkko Ruutu last Saturday night.
snippet: The N.H.L. handed down a 30-game suspension Wednesday to the Islanders’ Chris Simon for deliberately stamping on the right foot of the Penguins’ Jarkko Ruutu last Saturday night.
